name: Residence Inn Atlantic City Airport Egg Harbor Township

reviews.title: Really liked this new hotel
reviews.text: This hotel in new located not far from Atlantic City airport and AC itself - that makes it ideal for visiting either the area of for a spot of casino time if that's what you like to do.

We had a king suite which was beautiful. Large spacious living room and kitchen, huge king bed with nice linens and a large bathroom. Plus lots of wardrobe space, a big desk (free wi-fi) and lots of drawer storage.
reviews.title: Nice Stay

reviews.text: My family planned a relaxing weekend in Atlantic City to celebrate "Granny's" 85th Birthday. Most of the adults in the family, like to gamble; however some of us do not enjoy parting with our money so easily. The Egg Harbor location was perfect for all! The gamblers rode the shuttle to the casino's in Atlantic City and the rest of us were able to enjoy the Aquarium (hands-on), shopping, great food and even a movie.
reviews.title: Great Weekend!

reviews.text: I must admit, it was a little tiring driving back and forth from Atlantic City, back to the hotel; however I do not believe the relaxing part of the weekend could have been accomplished in such an environment of "Casino's," especially with children in tow.
reviews.title: Nice stay but not too close to AC

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: FYI, be sure to wash the dishware in the kitchen; we found a long strand of hair on the cutting board (yuck!).
reviews.title: Nice hotel, horrible staff

reviews.text: We all agreed that we will be back next year, so if you are in the area; please be sure to wish Granny a Happy 86th Birthday!
reviews.title: Nice clean, new, accomodations

reviews.text: The hotel is brand new with all the facilities in excellent condition. The kitchen was fully equipped.
reviews.title: Super nice for a Residence Inn

reviews.text: New is always nice. And this hotel is right up there. Flat screens mounted on walls, well appointed room and kitchen, excellent work out facility and pool. What's not to like?
reviews.title: A review from your long term business traveler

reviews.text: If you are visiting AC for the FAA facility this is where you want to be staying. Hotel even offers shuttle service to the casinos for fun and dining at their restaurants. There's also a small mall close by and a major one about 4 miles away.
reviews.title: Home away from home

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast is has a good selection and the offer a nice evening meal Monday - Wednesday.
reviews.title: Great clean hotel
house fire 83 year old mom
reviews.text: This is a pet friendly hotel. Personally I don't care for them as I don't believe any house keeping service or maid can/will clean a room to where it was before any pet stayed there.

I have stayed at this Residence Inn several times. I come into town to work at the FAA Tech Center. The Residence Inn is convenient for the drive--only about 10 minutes. It is close to many restaurants on Tilton Road and at the Shore Mall. Close to shopping at exit 12 at the Hamilton Mall. There is a grocery store (Genuardi's) about 1/4 mile down the road. The rooms are large, the wireless always works, nice flat screen tv's, a large fitness room and a business center with 2 computers/printers. They even serve free dinner a few nights a week. The staff has always been polite and cheerful. It's an overall great value and a nice place to come home to at night.
reviews.title: Pleasently surprised for the price paid.

aka: Residence Inn Atlantic City Airport Egg Harbor Township Hotel
